faqs.q: How do I book an appointment?
faqs.a: All appointments are managed through our secure our online booking portal scheduler. Browse available services, choose “Book Now,” and you’ll be guided step-by-step to pick a time that works for you.

faqs.q: Can I book more than one service in the same visit?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Select your primary treatment in the scheduler and add additional services or enhancements where available. If you’re unsure about timing, reach out and we’ll help customize the visit.

faqs.q: What if I don’t see a time that works?
faqs.a: our online booking portal shows Amy’s live calendar. If nothing fits, join the waitlist option inside the scheduler or email us with your preferred windows—we’ll reach out if a spot opens.

faqs.q: How far in advance can I schedule?
faqs.a: Spots typically release 6–8 weeks ahead. Set a reminder to check back or join the email list for early access to new availability.

Plans change—we get it. Cancel or reschedule 72+ hours before your appointment for a full refund (minus processing fees). Within 48–72 hours, 50% is refundable. Same-day cancellations or no-shows are non-refundable, but you’ll receive 25% off your next service (up to 50% of the cancelled value). Late arrivals may shorten service time to keep the schedule running smoothly.

faqs.q: Do you require a deposit to book?
faqs.a: A small, non-refundable retainer is collected at checkout to secure your appointment. It’s applied to your total service cost when you check out in-studio.

faqs.q: Which payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a: We accept major credit and debit cards, HSA/FSA cards for eligible services, and touchless options like Apple Pay in-studio.

faqs.q: Can I use a gift card or promo code?
faqs.a: Yes. Enter your code in the discount field on the our online booking portal checkout screen, or bring your digital/physical gift card to redeem at your visit.

faqs.q: Which facial is right for me?
faqs.a: Start with the Signature Aura Facial if you’re unsure—Amy will evaluate your skin and tailor modalities, products, and enhancements in real time.

faqs.q: How should I prepare before my appointment?
faqs.a: Pause retinoids, exfoliants, and aggressive treatments for 48–72 hours, arrive with clean skin when possible, and share any medication or health updates during intake.

faqs.q: I'm on acne medication—can I be treated?
faqs.a: Some services aren’t compatible with isotretinoin or certain prescriptions. Let us know what you’re using—Amy will advise safe alternatives or adjust the treatment protocol.
Many treatments can be adapted safely for pregnancy or nursing. Mention it during booking so we can tailor ingredients, techniques, and positioning for your comfort.
Yes, when it benefits your skin. Extractions are performed gently with barrier-supportive techniques to avoid unnecessary irritation.

faqs.q: What aftercare support do you provide?
faqs.a: You’ll leave with personalized home-care and product recommendations, plus follow-up access if you have questions. Expect a post-visit email with tailored tips.
Aura Aesthetics is based in Fort Lauderdale, FL with easy on-site parking. The studio operates by appointment only—your confirmation email will include directions and entry details.

faqs.q: What should I expect during my first visit?
faqs.a: Plan to arrive 10 minutes early to settle in, review your goals with Amy, and finalize any intake forms. We’ll create a relaxing, fully customized experience from start to finish.
Yes—curated professional products are available in-studio, and you’ll receive recommendations tailored to your routine after each service.
Gratuity is never expected but always appreciated. Digital tipping options are available if you choose to leave one.
Please share any mobility needs, fragrance sensitivities, or accommodation requests ahead of time. We’ll prepare the studio so you feel comfortable throughout your visit.
